review: So far so good.  It does what they say it'll do, and I haven't had any problems yet.  Makes binge watching a TV series easier as it rolls right into the next episode.  The interface is smooth and responsive, and the whole unit's small profile makes it virtually invisible in my home entertainment setup.  The only thing I'd suggest for future versions is they move the USB/power port to the other side of the device.  If you're hanging it off of the side of your TV the port is on the top of the unit, so the cord has to loop downward.
author: Kenn Baynard

review: Plugged it in. Changed to the correct input on the TV, punched in my internet code. Took a while to format but ever since it has been working without any loss of signal, which happens so often on my computer connection to the net!! Very happy with this tool.
